# autoenablesItems

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the button enables and disables its items every time a user event occurs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var autoenablesItems: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], user events cause the button to enable and disable its items automatically according to the NSMenuValidation protocol specification.

## Setting the type of menu

- **pullsDown**: A Boolean value indicating whether the button displays a pull-down or pop-up menu.
